revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Galar Mine No. 2 |image = [[File:Galar Mine No. 2.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Galar Mine No. 2. |tokens = 1,430,000 |location = South of Hulbury }}
<!--T:2--> '''Galar Mine No. 2''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 21,294,640 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Shellos (east).png|40px]] Shellos (East) || rowspan=2| [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Francis || rowspan=2| [[File:Carkol.png|40px]] Carkol |- | [[File:Wimpod.png|40px]] Wimpod |- | [[File:Binacle.png|40px]] Binacle || rowspan=2| [[File:Worker (female).png|40px]] Worker Yvonne || rowspan=2| [[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola, [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr |- | [[File:Chewtle.png|40px]] Chewtle |- | [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy || rowspan=3| [[File:Team Yell Grunts.png|40px]] Team Yell Grunts || rowspan=3| [[File:Thievul.png|40px]] Thievul, [[File:Galarian Linoone.png|40px]] Galarian Linoone, [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard, [[File:Pancham.png|40px]] Pancham |- | [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk |- | [[File:Shuckle.png|40px]] Shuckle |- | [[File:Noibat.png|40px]] Noibat || rowspan=3| [[File:Rail Staff.png|40px]] Rail Staff Vincent || rowspan=3| [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- | [[File:Corphish.png|40px]] Corphish |}
